name: Adventure of a Digger
description: The player must collect all the gold in a level while avoiding guards who try to catch the player. After collecting all the gold, the player must touch the top of the screen to reach the next level.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: intel core 2 duo Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel hd 4600 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i9 Graphics: Nvidia 1080ti DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 500 MB available space
